app.title: Pixlr AI Photo Editor
app.description:
Unleash your creativity with Pixlr AI Art Photo Editor (formerly Pixlr Express) â€“ your go-to free photo editor powered by advanced AI technology. Join over 18 million creators worldwide who trust Pixlr to transform their images with ease and precision. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned photographer, Pixlr provides an intuitive platform to create stunning visuals with just a few clicks.

Capture any moment and let your creativity shine with over 2 million combinations of FREE effects, overlays, and filters. Seamlessly share your photos with friends or followers through email, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, or any other social network.

New AI-Powered Features

    AI Generative Fill â€“ Highlight any area in your photo and watch as Pixlr's AI-powered generator seamlessly fills it with objects.
    AI Remove Object â€“ Effortlessly remove any object from your image, and let our AI intelligently fill in the blanks.
    AI Remove Background â€“ Enjoy pixel-perfect background removal, thanks to our cutting-edge AI editor.


Comprehensive Photo Editing Features

    Explore seasonally updated multi-layered Social Media templates designed to elevate your digital content.
    Create stunning photo collages effortlessly with a variety of preset collage designs, grid styles, customized ratios, and backgrounds.
    Instantly adjust the color of your photos in one click using Auto Fix, making your images pop with vibrant hues.
    Experiment with Double Exposure to create breathtaking effects using layers and adjustable transparency.
    Add artistic flair to your images with Stylize effects like pencil sketch, poster, watercolor, and more.
    Remove blemishes, red-eye, smoothen skin, or whiten teeth effortlessly with simple and precise tools.
    Highlight specific colors in your photo using the Color Splash effect, or create depth with Focal Blur.
    Choose from a wide range of effect packs to give your photos the look and feel you desire.
    Adjust the tone of your photos using overlays â€“ amplify, cool down, or add surreal shades to your images.
    Easily add text to your photos with a variety of fonts, ensuring your message stands out.
    Complete your editing with the perfect border â€“ select a style that complements your photo.
    Keep your content fresh with our growing library of additional effects, overlays, and border packs.
    Save time by keeping track of your favorite effects and overlays with the convenient Favorites button.
    Quickly crop and resize images to your desired dimensions before saving and sharing.


Connect with Us
We value your feedback and ideas, as they help us make Pixlr the best photo editor experience possible. Connect with us on Instagram (@pixlr), TikTok (@pixlrofficial), or Facebook (/Pixlr) to stay updated with the latest features and news.

For support or bug reporting, feel free to reach out to us at info@pixlr.com.

Privacy Policy | Terms of Use

Join over 18 million creators worldwide who trust Pixlr to transform their images with ease and precision. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned photographer, Pixlr provides an intuitive platform to create stunning visuals with just a few clicks.

app.summary: AI Photo Retouch & Image Generation. Express Collage Design and Editing.

reviews.text: Used to Love this App ðŸ˜­ Now, Holding the pic to align it, shrinks it so you can't â€¢ New UI is horrible, clunky â€¢ Long Vid Ads freeze App before it saves, losing project! â€¢ Overlay adds a border to the top image, ruining overlay â€¢ If working on a white pic, the options across the top blend in. Can't see them â€¢ Ads to buy app pops up just as you select project â€¢ No undo option when drawing â€¢ Overlay resizes the picture so it's hard to resize & lineup if using same pic
reviews.replyText:
Hi there, thank you for reaching out to Pixlr.
We appreciate your feedback and suggestion and will send it in to our respective team for their review and consideration.
Thank you for the support.

reviews.text: This used to be a good app (the previous versions were my primary photo editor for years) but after the most recent update, it's garbage. It no longer functions without a persistant web connection. I was fine with their old, in-app ads (everyone's gotta make a living) but if you have to pay for a usable app, then you're better off buying a fully-featured version from one of the big developers (Adobe, for example) and pay for it ONCE, rather than do a monthly subscription from this company. ðŸ™„

New update is terrible. how frustrating. why make things more complicated and less usable? fight me in real life. I wouldn't be so frustrated with pixar over the years if it wasn't such a reasonably good editing app. But it WAS a better app for a decade. Now, every change is for the worse, and to introduce more ads. I am willing to fight the makers in real life.
reviews.replyText:
Hi there, thank you for reaching out to Pixlr.
We believe it might be a bug between the mobile device and version
If you encounter an error or bug, kindly email to info@pixlr.com with the screenshot and your mobile details for us to investigate and advise further.
Hope to hear from you soon.

reviews.text: Would be a nice app, but.... honestly, when you are typing a text for a photo, there is no "Done" button. Nothing! Just the usual X but when you hit that, as you probably guessed, it erases all that you just did. It's like that for other features as well, not just the texting. How they missed this is just beyond me. Maybe it's an issue that only i am having. However, idk why that would be. I have a top of the line, $1200 flagship phone and it usually doesn't make mistakes like this. However, im surprised that no one else complained about that yet. Or maybe they have, idk yet. And YES, I have absolutely looked for a "Done" button for about 10 minutes, to no avail. So something neeeeeeeds to be done about this. But for now I'm uninstalling and going elsewhere. Somewhere much better actually, but i wont say it on here so i dont wreck their business.

Like many others, I'm going to mention the fact that it no longer saves properly. I can't find the file it's saving to, if it actually is saving the files, as e developers claim. Fix this. Otherwise great app. Until the saving issue is fixed, I'm going to screenshot the images I work on after I'm done. It's a dumb extra step, but it works.
reviews.replyText:
Hi there,
Thank you for reaching out to Pixlr.
The latest Android OS no longer allow us to save images outside of app location.
Now the edited image are saved in your photo album.
You may change the file location in the top left setting or reinstall to create a new folder.
Apologies for the inconvenience and thank you for your kind understanding.

reviews.text: I have used Pixlr for my photos since 2013, and I have always loyally used it. I just realized that they put in intrusive apps. Fine. I can almost deal with that, except now when I save my edited photos, they look horrible. The quality is low, there is a blue hue to the pictures. They look nothing like the picture I edited on the app. I'm EXTREMELY disappointed that you guys are trying to force people to purchase a subscription this way. I'm uninstalling and using Adobe.

Been using this app for years, since 2015, and have loved everything about it, until this most recent update. Now, if you lose signal for whatever reason, pixlr will try to force you to subscribe to their paid service, and if you don't, their app will immediately boot you, regardless of whether or not you were in the middle of editing a photo. It has happened to me multiple times and I have lost so much progress. I hate it.

Update: I uninstalled and then reinstalled the app and it was saving my photos again. But now here we are a few weeks later and it's not saving my photos anymore. I have paid version. Fix this Pixlr!!!! Can't save photos. The latest updates or something causes none of the photos to save. It says saved but nothing showed up anywhere in my phone. Not in file manager or also not in my photo gallery. It used to show in my photo gallery. If this is a glitch I hope it gets fixed very soon.
reviews.replyText:
Hi there,
Thank you for reaching out to Pixlr.
By right, after you reinstall the app, the image should be saved into the new folder.
We believe there might be some sort of 3rd party issue on the mobile device in regards to the app.
For further assistance, kindly email to info@pixlr.com with your mobile device details.

reviews.text: UPDATE: they're fully pivoted to AI now, to the point it's obtrusive to other features. Time to uninstall. Used to be a serviceable app. The ads are so intrusive at this point though that when you get one, no matter what you do, your phone is taken over for at least 30 seconds, and when you go to click the microscopic little x to exit it, it forced you into the app store to the download page, usually at least twice. Completely unusable and plays sounds from ads even when not in app.
reviews.replyText:
Hi there, thank you for reaching out to Pixlr.
Thank you for your feedback, we will send it in to our respective team for their review and future consideration.

reviews.text: All I wanted was a quick resizing of an image. If this app can do it, I did not find it in my 10 minutes of looking for it. It shouldn't take more than 1 minute to find how to resize and image. Dont care what other amazing thing it can do, if it cant do the most simple of tasks than it is a failure. I will totally give this a 5 star if they add that in and make it easily accessible. The app is overall great, or it should be if it was an actually good picture editor and not just things to make cool selfies. Ugh...what photo editor cant resize an image, this is so stupid.

app.recentChanges:
- New feature: AI Image To Video!
- Design improvements
- Stability improvements

More & Bigger Updates Coming Soon!
app.AIReview:
Pixlr AI Photo Editor Review â€“ A Powerful Free Tool With Room to Grow

Overview

Pixlr AI Photo Editor, formerly Pixlr Express, has rapidly become a dominant force in the mobile photo editing landscape. Boasting over 100 million installs and a robust 4.35-star rating from more than 1.2 million users, this free application offers an impressive suite of features leveraging both traditional image editing techniques and increasingly sophisticated AI capabilities. The appâ€™s core mission â€“ to empower creativity through accessible photo manipulation â€“ is successfully achieved, particularly for those new to advanced photo editing. The recent rebranding to "AI Art Photo Editor" signals a significant shift in the platform's focus, integrating generative AI tools alongside its established functionality. This review will delve into Pixlr AIâ€™s strengths and weaknesses, evaluating its suitability for both casual users and more experienced photographers.

Key Features

The appâ€™s feature set is extensive, categorized primarily around image retouching, creative effects, and â€“ crucially â€“ AI-powered generation:

  • AI Art Generator: This is the headline feature. Users can input text prompts to generate entirely new images from scratch, exploring styles ranging from photorealistic landscapes to abstract art. The quality varies depending on the prompt's specificity; however, itâ€™s remarkably effective for producing surprising and visually appealing results.
  • AI Photo Enhancer: Leveraging AI, this tool automatically improves photos with features like auto-enhance, background removal, object removal, and portrait retouching. It operates surprisingly well, often delivering noticeable improvements in a single tap.
  • Traditional Editing Tools: Pixlr retains its roots as a robust photo editor offering a comprehensive collection of tools: layers, masking, curves, color adjustments (brightness, contrast, saturation), blur, sharpen, vignettes, and more. These are seamlessly integrated with the AI features.
  • Collage Maker: The app includes a dedicated collage maker allowing users to combine multiple images into various layouts, complete with customizable borders and effects. Over 2 million combinations of free effects further expands design possibilities.
  • Templates & Presets: A vast library of pre-designed templates and presets provides instant style transformations for photos, catering to different aesthetics and social media platforms.
  • One-Tap Effects: Simple, impactful filters and effects are readily available for quick enhancements.

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Integration: The AI Art Generator and Photo Enhancer represent a significant leap forward in mobile photo editing. They provide genuinely useful tools that can dramatically reduce the time needed to achieve professional-looking results.
  • Intuitive Interface (for Beginners): Despite the breadth of features, Pixlr maintains an intuitive user interface, making it accessible to beginners who are unfamiliar with complex image editing terminology. The guided tutorials and tooltips further contribute to this ease of use.
  • High Level of Customization: For users comfortable with traditional photo editing techniques, Pixlr offers a remarkable degree of control over every aspect of the image. Layer masking and advanced adjustment tools provide flexibility that rivals desktop software.
  • Large Community & Support: With 100 million+ installs, Pixlr benefits from a large user base providing ample resources for troubleshooting and inspiration via online forums and tutorials.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Output Consistency: While impressive, the AI Art Generatorâ€™s output can be inconsistent. Complex prompts still require careful refinement to achieve desired results. A more granular control over stylistic parameters within the AI generator would be beneficial.
  • Limited Free Tier Restrictions (Increasing): While "free," certain advanced AI features and higher resolutions for generated images are locked behind a subscription, which could feel restrictive to casual users who primarily want to experiment with the AI tools. The app is increasingly pushing premium subscriptions.
  • Performance on Lower-End Devices: Some users have reported performance issues â€“ particularly lag when using multiple AI features or working with large image files â€“ on older smartphones and tablets. Optimization for lower-end devices would improve accessibility.
  • Tutorial Depth for Advanced Features: While beginner tutorials are plentiful, more in-depth guides covering the advanced layer masking, curve adjustments, and other complex tools would be welcome.

User Experience

The user experience is generally very positive. The appâ€™s navigation is clear and logical, with a well-organized layout that makes it easy to find the desired features. The transition between traditional editing and AI tools is seamless. However, the sheer volume of options can feel overwhelming at first. A more streamlined onboarding process could help new users quickly grasp the core functionalities. The responsiveness of the app is generally good, though as noted previously, performance degrades noticeably on less powerful devices.

Value for Money

Pixlr AI Photo Editor offers exceptional value for money, being entirely free to download and use. While premium features are available through a subscription, the core functionality â€“ including the AI Art Generator and Photo Enhancer â€“ provides immense creative potential without requiring any financial commitment. The subscription model is priced competitively compared to similar apps, offering access to higher resolution generation, more advanced AI controls, and removal of watermarks.

Conclusion

Pixlr AI Photo Editor represents a significant advancement in mobile photo editing. Its powerful AI tools, combined with its robust traditional editing capabilities and intuitive user interface, make it an outstanding choice for both beginners and experienced photographers. Despite some minor areas for improvement â€“ particularly regarding output consistency and device optimization â€“ the appâ€™s strengths far outweigh its weaknesses. The free version provides a remarkable level of functionality, making it a highly recommended download for anyone looking to explore their creativity with AI-powered photo editing. The continued development of the AI features suggests a bright future for Pixlr as a leading platform in this rapidly evolving space.
